data.title: Chance for dark allies to gain <:Status_Gorilla:840184190241996840> **Gorilla** upon using Ability **Handsome Gorilla DA**
text: <:Status_Gorilla:840184190241996840> **Gorilla's** ATK boost equals 25% ATK when above 75% HP and decreases linearly when below 75% HP, down to 10% ATK at 0% HP.
<:Status_Gorilla:840184190241996840> **Gorilla** stacks additively with <:Status_Strength:832601501335289908> **Strength**.
Allies with <:Status_Gorilla:840184190241996840> **Gorilla** will have their voices replaced with gorilla sounds.
The voice change has no effect on gameplay.
<:Status_Gorilla:840184190241996840> **Gorilla** is the same status effect granted by the summon **Gorilla**.
